column5: Our flat is located on the top floor of our modern high rises. On the bottom floor you have access to our 24 hour gym and Pilates/Yoga studio. Group classes are available on select weekday evenings. With advanced notice you may also be a family guest at North Dallas's premiere fitness center and spa . You will also be steps away from restaurants and bars. When time permits take advantage of private theatre, game room, volleyball court , two beautiful pools and underground parking . Kuerig coffee and light breakfast provided. My 14 yr old son is available to entertain young travelers !
column8: Private room in luxury condo near Galleria mall !
